column4: Hey guys.. I had 3 monitors(3 different video cards) working on winxp... I wanted ubuntu :) and its not as easy as I thought..
i had 3 monitors working ages and ages ago..  it was flakey then. :)
are all the cards using teh same drivers?
Id settle to get 2 up(then work on the 3rd heh).. no ati, nvidia and intel.
